title: Little Weird
body:
[C] Late night walking [Am] around in this old [F] city [G]
[C] Neon lights are [Am] flashing on your [F] perfect skin [G]
[C] You don’t even [Am] know that I’m watching your [F] every move [G]
Just [C] talking, walking, [Am] laughing, talking - [F] round and round [G]

bodyLyrics:
Late night walking around in this old city 
Neon lights are flashing on your perfect skin 
You don’t even know that I’m watching your every move 
Just talking, walking, laughing, talking - round and round 

Cause I’m feeling a little weird looking into your eyes 
Cause I’m feeling a little weird looking into your eyes 

And we dance with no music 
And we dream under the stars 
Dance with no music 
And we dream under the stars 

Acting silly, feeling infinite 
You don’t want to go home 
We don’t mind what the others say
Cause we’re having the best time tonight 

And I’m feeling a little weird looking into your eyes 
And I’m feeling a little weird looking into your eyes 

And we dance with no music 
And we dream under the stars 
Dance with no music 
And we dream under the stars 

Floating somewhere in the space
